dmca.title: Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.crispykicks.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Fabio Silva [mailto:fsilva@burberryusa.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2007 3:42 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: Legal Admin
Subject: Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.crispykicks.com
Importance: High

 

 

May 31, 2007

 

VIA EMAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

Email: copyright@theplanet.com <mailto:copyright@theplanet.com>  

Fax: (214) 782-7756

 

RE:  Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.crispykicks.com
<http://www.crispykicks.com/> 

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

            I CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of Burberry Limited ("IP Owner"), the owner
of certain intellectual property rights, specifically federal trademark
registrations U.S. Reg. No. 260,843 (issued August 27, 1929) and U.S.
Reg. No. 510,077 (issued May 24, 1949) for the BURBERRY word mark, U.S.
Reg. No. 1,241,222 (issued June 7, 1983) and U.S. Reg. No. 2,022,789
(issued December 17, 1996) for the BURBERRY CHECK trademark, and U.S.
Reg. No. 863,179 (issued January 7, 1969) for the EQUESTRIAN KNIGHT
DEVICE.  

 

I have a good faith belief that the materials found through the links
below are not authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law and
therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or
United States law.  

 

It is my understanding that your company, ThePlanet.com provides web
hosting services to the above-referenced web site.  Therefore, I am
requesting that your company, pursuant to its Copyright Policy ("CP"),
shut down the web site for offering for sale counterfeit goods.  

 

            In particular, I refer to those parts of the CP that read:
"The Planet reserves the right to (i) suspend permanently or terminate
The Planet Services of such Customer and/or (ii) suspend permanently or
terminate the access to The Planet Services, The Planet Network or its
physical infrastructure by such Third Party."

 

Links:

 

http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16942&cat=0&page=
1

http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16757&cat=0&page=
1


http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16635&cat=0&page=
1

http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16712&cat=0&page=
1

 

 

 

http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16371&cat=0&page=
1

http://www.crispykicks.com/store/product.php?productid=16375&cat=0&page=
1

 

 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

 

Sincerely,

 

/s/

 

Fabio R. Silva

Intellectual Property Counsel

BURBERRY LIMITED, USA
1350 Ave of the Americas
New York, NY  10019
212-707-6500 main
212-707-6545 direct dial
212-246-2486 fax

 


This  message, including any attachment(s) is confidential information
and  is  for  the  sole use of the intended recipient(s). Unauthorized
interception,   review,   use,   disclosure  or  distribution  of  any
information contained within this message and/or its attachment(s), is
strictly  prohibited.  If  you  are not the intended recipient, please
notify  the  sender  by  replying  to this mail message and delete all
copies of the original message and any attachments.
